body: Finally got the hang of making #latteart! What do you think of my first attempt? #coffee #baristalife

comments.body: That looks so good! It’s like something you’d get at a café. How hard was it to do?
@34343 Thanks! It took a few tries to get the pour just right, but once you get the hang of it, it’s fun!
This is amazing! What design is that? A heart? A leaf?
@45454 It’s supposed to be a heart, but it kind of looks like a leaf, doesn’t it? Still working on the finer details!
Did you have to use a special type of milk to get that froth? I can never get mine to look that smooth.
@56565 I used whole milk for this one. The fat content makes it easier to get that creamy texture. Oat milk works pretty well too!
I’ve always wanted to try making latte art! Do you need a fancy espresso machine to do this?
@67676 Not really! I have a mid-range machine with a steam wand, and that’s all you need. The technique is the tricky part!
This is so cool! Next time, you should try doing a flower design. I bet you could nail it!
@78787 That’s the plan! I’ve been watching tutorials, so maybe next time I’ll try something more complex like a tulip.
